sniffer_js.inject_js: function sniffer() {  let videoTags = document.getElementsByTagName("video");  let jsonObj = {    res_list: [],  };  console.log("video tags count:" + videoTags.length);  for (var i = 0; i < videoTags.length; i++) {    let url = videoTags[i].src;    console.log("video tag:" + url);    if (url != null && url.length > 0) {      let item = {        url: url,      };      jsonObj.res_list.push(item);    }  }  let respStr = JSON.stringify(jsonObj);  window.appInterface.onSnifferVideo(videoTags.length, respStr);  console.log(respStr);}
